name: Stronger Together TD
description:
Just a simple Tower Defense game where certain patterns of towers get merged into a single stronger tower.  3 types of tower upgrades and 4 types of enemies.  Waves are procedurally generated so the game lasts forever.  Unfortunately I was unable to get audio added to the game in time for the game jam submission, but pretty much all of the other features I wanted to add I managed to get in.

This game was made using a custom game engine I made myself on top of SDL2, additionally this game also uses Dear ImGui for the GUI elements.  Was only tested on Windows 10, so it may or may not work on Linux
